thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com | 3 of 111
thread.title: Ernie
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Ernie

author: Ernie
title: Ernie
text:
At first, my experience wasn't pleasant. The technician checked my faucets and took some parts apart. He said he would call Choice Home Warranty to see if the repairs could me done. I didn't hear from him. CHW called me and the repairs would not be done because the repairs are not covered. I could called the technician and have the company fix the problem at my expense.
I was upset and called CHW to cancel my contract. CHW checked my claim and the repairs were done.
Excellent job repairing the faucets.
